name: Make Love
description:
Go out, they said. Make Love, they said. It will be easy, they said. Get drunk, then party the hell out of yourself.

How about simulating that experiance?

As it shows, everyone who tries this game approaches it on different terms. Initialy, I thought I made a funny game about drinking too much. But it turned out to be a party edutaiment.

Made during the Warsaw Film School Game Jam 1 (2016).
